channel.title: gaming on inkel
channel.description: Recent content in gaming on inkel

item.title: Am I a gamer now?
item.description: For years I disliked playing games. Never before in my life I had a gaming console, and the last game I played from start to end was The Secret of Monkey Island. But a couple of years ago I decided to buy a PlayStation 4 and I’m extremely happy with that decision. The main reason was of course to start playing myself, but also to raise my kids in a house where gaming is “normal”.
